reviewText: The title is enticing because so many players have a first touch issue, but it's just OK.  I got annoyed listening to this coach give instruction to the players.  I expected more specific drills that would work well with a team.

Good drills to develop the first touch, which is arguably the most important skill in Soccer. I like Bidzinski's dvds a lot. His use of cones may seem a bit structured at first, but for certain types of kids, this is the way to learn.
Good stuff!
